text: A Twenty20 International (T20I) is a form of cricket which is played over 20 overs per side between two national cricket teams. The game is played under the rules of Twenty20 cricket. The first Twenty20 International took place on 17 February 2005. Australia defeated New Zealand by 44 runs at Eden Park in Auckland. ==Teams with T20I status== The teams below play Twenty20 International cricket: ==References== Category:International cricket Category:2005 establishments Category:Forms of cricket
title: Twenty20 International
